item.title: Android Terminal - Termux
item.description: This page need to be updated. I will introduce the termux app and describe how to have a true linux environment using proot. About Termux Termux is an Android terminal emulator and Linux environment application that works directly with no rooting or setup required. from Termux Wiki Install Termux According to the Termux Wiki, now we should install the termux from F-droid, althought we also can install the old version from Goole Play.
